memberdef.name: LBANN_ERROR
memberdef.initializer: do { \ std::stringstream ss_LBANN_ERROR; \ ss_LBANN_ERROR << "LBANN error" \ << " (" << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << ")" \ << ": " << message; \ throw lbann::lbann_exception(ss_LBANN_ERROR.str()); \ } while(0)

memberdef.name: log_msg
memberdef.initializer: {\ char str[256];\ sprintf(str, __VA_ARGS__);\ std::cout << "[" << m_comm->get_model_rank() << "." << m_comm->get_rank_in_model() << "][" << __FUNCTION__ << "][Line " << __LINE__ << "]" << str << std::endl; \ }

memberdef.name: log_simple_msg
memberdef.initializer: {\ char str[256];\ sprintf(str, __VA_ARGS__);\ std::cout << "[" << __FUNCTION__ << "][Line " << __LINE__ << "]" << str << std::endl; \ }

briefdescription.para: Data layout that is optimized for different modes of parallelism.

inbodydescription.para: Weights are stored in STAR_STAR and data in STAR_VC

xrefdescription.para: this should be an lbann_exception but then the class has to move to resolve dependencies

detaileddescription.para: returns a string representation of the pool_mode

briefdescription.para: Print the dimensions and name of a Elemental matrix.
